alert.note: Alert for Castro; Parmer (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lubbock (Lubbock and South Plains Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 9:29PM CDT by NWS Lubbock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Parmer and Castro Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 929 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles west of Easter, or 11 miles northwest of Dimmitt, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Blowing dust may also cause abrupt reductions in visibility. Locations impacted include... Dimmitt, Friona, Summerfield, Easter, Black and Nazareth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Slow down if driving into blowing dust.
